visual.name: GanttChartByxViz
visual.description: A Gantt Chart shows activities (tasks or events) displayed along a given timeline. On the left side of the chart is the Data Grid, which displays the activities or resources based on dimension members. On the right hand side the Gantt chart displays a visual representation of certain activities in the typical bar display. For example, you could visualize the Gantt Chart with one measure as Progress  and several additional dimensions indicating the actual and planned date values.A Gantt Chart as Resource Chart shows the timeline of the individual resource. A resource could be an actual person with an assigned task, or a resource could be an actual resource, such as a car or a machine, required for the task. For example, you could visualize the Gantt Chart as Resource Chart with two measures as Start Date and End Date and two dimensions as Task and Resource where  Resource is mandatory.

dataRoles.name: Task
dataRoles.description: More than one task category forms a hierarchy

dataRoles.name: actualStart
dataRoles.description: Start date for the task

dataRoles.name: actualEnd
dataRoles.description: End date for the task

dataRoles.name: duration
dataRoles.description: Alternate for end Date.It will add value from Duration unit(APS) with start date to get end date.

dataRoles.name: progressValue
dataRoles.description: Percentage value representing  percentage of task completed

dataRoles.name: progressBase
dataRoles.description: Base value to calculate the Percentage of task completion in case the progress value is not in percentage format

dataRoles.name: baselineStart
dataRoles.description: Planned Start date for the task

dataRoles.name: baselineEnd
dataRoles.description: Planned End date for the task

dataRoles.name: primaryConnectTo
dataRoles.description: Establish task dependency by stating the Task name(child) or TaskID to connect

dataRoles.name: primaryConnectorType
dataRoles.description: Relationship for task dependency

dataRoles.name: secondaryConnectTo
dataRoles.description: Same as Primary Connect To. Use when a task has more than one dependency

dataRoles.name: secondaryConnectorType
dataRoles.description: Relationship for task dependency for secondary connection

dataRoles.name: displayColumn
dataRoles.description: Additional category field to be displayed in the Data Grid

dataRoles.name: displayMeasures
dataRoles.description: Additional value field to be displayed in the Data Grid

dataRoles.name: milestone
dataRoles.description: Assign one or more date fields to display Milestone(Date Hierarchy is not allowed)

dataRoles.name: milestoneType
dataRoles.description: Define the type of milestone.Each milestone type can be configured separately

dataRoles.name: dataLabel
dataRoles.description: Assign any field as a data label

dataRoles.name: tmeasure
dataRoles.description: Assign any fields for additional information to be displayed in tooltips

dataRoles.name: TaskID
dataRoles.description: Indicates primary connect and secondary connect using the taskID

dataRoles.name: ascSort
dataRoles.description: Sort any field in the ascending order

dataRoles.name: dscSort
dataRoles.description: Sort any field in the descending order

dataRoles.name: timelineDate
dataRoles.description: Start and End Dates for the Timeline Scale

key.description: Unlock additional capabilities with your license key. To purchase a license, visit our website http://xviz.com

equalBarHeight.displayName: Equal height for parent and child bars

enableZoomButton.description: zoom in and out option for end users

fontfamily.description: Applied to all the text in the visual

enumeration.value: Lucida Grande, Lucida Sans Unicode, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif

"Segoe UI Light", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif

ganttChartType.description: Select the type of Gantt Chart

headerHeight.description: Total Height of the header across Data view and Timeline

hideParentOnCollapse.description: This option will hide the parent bar onCollapse

hideParentOnExpand.description: This option will hide the parent bar onExpand

zoomButtonBackgroundColor.description: Background Color for the Zoom button

zoomButtonColor.description: Symbol Color for the Zoom button

categoryIndentation.description: Set the indent of the category labels

autoSplitPosition.description: Splitter position will automatically set best possible range

headerBackgroungColor.description: To set the background color for the headers.

headerFontColor.description: To set the font color for the headers.

headerFontSize.description: To set the Font size for the headers

nodeCustomizationChildParent.description: Choose the node type to customize

nodeCustomizationChildRoot.description: Choose the node type to customize

ganttscrollenable.description: To be used when Zoom Range is disabled

hposition.description: Select the horizontal location for the legend

vpositionGantt.description: Select the alignment for the legend

hideParentBorder.description: This option will hide the parent border

negativeValueFormat.description: Select the number format for  Negative values

positiveValueFormat.description: Select the number format for  Positive values

individualTooltip.description: If enabled, tooltip will not be shown on the entire row. Instead, individual tooltips will be shown on bars and milestones.

enumeration.value: Lucida Grande, Lucida Sans Unicode, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif
"Segoe UI Bold", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif
"Segoe UI Light", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif

utilityMenuIconColor.description: Customize the color of Utility Menu icon
